sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves something
ali kadar nekaj
moves
, se spremeni položaj tistega.

seg.quote: I'll have to move the car.
The curtains behind began to move.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves
, spremeni svoj položaj ali gre nekam drugam.

seg.quote: I was so scared I couldn't move.
He moved eagerly towards the door to welcome his visitors.
Neither she nor any of the others made a move.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves
ali
moves house
, gre živet v drugo hišo.

seg.quote: My parents moved from Hyde to Stepney.
I wrecked a good stereo on my last move.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves
ali
is moved from one place or job to another
, gre iz enega kraja v drugega ali iz ene službe v drugo.

seg.quote: Executives are being moved around from one company to another.
He'd moved to the BBC from publishing.
Regular moves for junior executives are a company policy.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves towards a particular state or opinion
, začne biti v določenem stanju ali imeti določeno mnenje.

seg.quote: We are moving rapidly into the nuclear age.
This was the first step in his move away from the Labour party.

sense.def:
Kadar razmere
are moving
, se razvijajo in napredujejo.

seg.quote: Events now moved swiftly.
What has moved the President to take this step?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
moves someone
, v nekom sproži globoko čustvo, največkrat žalost ali sočutje.

seg.quote: The whole incident had moved her profoundly.
He was too moved to speak.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves a motion or amandment
, na nekem sestanku predlaga nekaj, o čemer lahko ljudje glasujejo.

A move
je tudi dejanje, ki ga človek izvede, da nekaj doseže.

seg.quote: Accepting this job was a very good move.
For six days neither side made a move.

sense.def:
Pri igri, kot je šah, je
a move
premik šahovske figure na drugo mesto na šahovnici.

seg.quote: Whose move is it?

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
on the move
, ves čas hodi od enega kraja do drugega.

seg.quote: Billie Jean is constantly on the move.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves down
, se premakne na nižjo stopnjo ali v nižji razred.

seg.quote: When they fail their mathematics exams they move down a year.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves in somewhere
, začne živeti v drugi hiši ali kraju.

seg.quote: He moved in with Mrs Camish.

sense.def:
Kadar vojaki ali policisti
move in
, gredo proti kraju ali osebi, da bi jo napadli ali prevzeli nadzor nad njo.

seg.quote: They were under orders to move in from France.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje ali vozila
move off
, začnejo zapuščati neki kraj.

seg.quote: The gleaming fleet of cars prepared to move off.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves on
, zapusti neki kraj ali opusti neko dejavnost in gre drugam ali začne delati nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: After three weeks in Hong Kong, we moved on to Japan.
Can we move on to the second question?

sense.def:
Kadar človek
moves out
, odide iz hiše ali kraja, kjer je dotlej živel, in gre živet nekam drugam.

Kadar človek
moves up
, preide na višjo stopnjo ali v višji razred.

seg.quote: The Vice-President should move up into the Presidency.
